rules.description: Single Press Caps Lock Alone to delete, press and hold to Hyper
Change shift + delete to forward delete (rev 2)
Post Escape if Command_R is pressed alone.
Hyper Misc    (Check https://github.com/suliveevil/Capslock for all details)
For Visual Studio Code: Emacs key bindings [option+keys] (rev 5)
For Visual Studio Code: Bash style Emacs key bindings (rev 2)
Simultaneously press Equals + Del to get a ForwardDel
For Visual Studio Code: Bash style Emacs key bindings (rev 2)
For Visual Studio Code: Emacs key bindings [control+keys] (rev 10)
Map fn + number keys to their corresponding function keys (rev 1)
Home key to the beginning of the sentence (Command + Left). Doesnt work in terminal
End key to the end of the sentence (Command + Right). Doesnt work in terminal
Change mouse button 4/5 to navigate back/forward in VSCode
